reviewText: Provides a lot of useful information for an intermediate to advance dancer. Not for beginners.
I love Saida workshops and Mario's music, so... I love this dvd, as well as the other dvd from them. I recommend it!

This is very nice dvd by both Saida and Mario. Their explanations are really, really good...
I would say it is not for beginners...The coreo is fantastic! very professional (with a veil)
Saida has a lot of BALLET in her dance (I really like it but some people don`t) so I think If you want to do her style you have to be familiar with the principles of ballet...
The dvd is in spanish with english subtitles
Super buen Dvd, me encantó, y que bueno que esta en español.
El prof Kirlis explica los ritmos de una manera muy clara y diferente. Tambien me gusto mucho la expliaccion de Saida es bastante detallada. La coreo es con velo, esta bella y muy profesional.
La unica pequeña desventaja para algunas personas es que el estilo de Saida es lindo pero bastante balletizado, lo cual implica que para aplicarlo habria que empaparse un poco mas sobre los principios del ballet clasico.
